p: The presence of luteolin 7-glucoside, chlorogenic acid and caffeic acid was confirmed in all studied lavender methanolic extracts. Moreover, the presence of apigenin was confirmed for L. stoechas, L. angustifolia „Rosea” and L. angustifolia; the presence of myricetin was confirmed for L. lanata, L. viridis and L. angustifolia „Rosea”; luteolin is presented in L. stoechas, L. lanata and L. viridis; ferulic acid is identified for L. viridis.
